did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Record Center-Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Wise County (Va.) Marriage Licenses, 1856-1912. Local government records collection, Wise County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Wise County under the Accession number 51391.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Wise County was named for Henry Alexander Wise, governor of Virginia from 1856 to 1860. It was formed in 1856 from Lee, Scott, and Russell Counties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Wise County (Va.) Marriage Licenses, 1856-1912, consists of marriage licenses.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Wise County Marriage Records and Vital Statistics may be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm
